channel.title: Suggestion: Dayvig Mechanic for Unseen
channel.description:
I want an evil class to have a dayvig ability that immediately kills their target and outs yourself to the court.
Something like:
**Day Ability - Desperate Strike (1 use)**: Murder your target in plain sight of the entire court. They are killed immediately and you are automatically voted up to trial.
**Why Dayvig for Evils?**
This will make D1 Prince claims very dangerous. This would be the only true threat to an early Prince claim as poisoning or bleeding a Prince doesn't work since there will almost always be an Alch or Physician to heal them. But killing them straight up in cold blood over the discussion table....sounds scary.
It's a great ability if you have majority or think you have majority with neutral support. It won't happen every game as the MM needs to convert a Knight, but the mere threat of an Enforcer on D2 could be enough to scare Princes from claiming.
**Who should get this ability?**
The Enforcer. The Enforcer is fairly mediocre once he uses his Frenzy, so sacrificing yourself after a Frenzy usage won't feel as bad if he had better night abilities. Preventing visits to an Unseen is pretty good though, so you'll have to weigh your options and make interesting choices between wanting to protect long term or go for the short term, high profile kill.
**Overpowered?**
Probably. Simply because it allows Mastermind to convert somebody the following night after the Enforcer is lynched. However, _BD doesn't have to lynch_ the outed Enforcer if they don't want that to happen.
**Thoughts?**

item.title: Suggestion: Dayvig Mechanic for Unseen
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
Sketch:

Why Dayvig for Evils?

This will make D1 Prince claims very dangerous. This would be the only true threat to an early Prince claim as poisoning or bleeding a Prince doesn’t work since there will almost always be an Alch or Physician to heal them. But killing them straight up in cold blood over the discussion table…sounds scary.

Fix:
Prince cannot be healed.
Now Prince needs to stay in the shadows!

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion: Dayvig Mechanic for Unseen
item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:
Icibalus:

It’s a reasonable trade-off.

This tradeoff isn’t reasonable if they are the NK.
Dayvig needs to also include ‘If your target is immune to death, your attack will fail and the entire court will be aware of the attempt.’

Read full topic

item.description:
What if it were just the original assassin that had this ability?

item.title: Suggestion: Dayvig Mechanic for Unseen
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Sketch:

A Prince for the Mastermind sounds fair.

I don’t think so. No jails is less important than no converts (they are both important tho). It is not a fair trade. Not even close.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion: Dayvig Mechanic for Unseen
item.dc:creator: Sketch
item.description:
Agree with Hip on all accounts here, honestly

I don’t want the Prince to NEVER be able to claim, I just don’t want D1 auto-win claims. I want it to be a delicate balance.

If Mastermind is given the dayvig ability, he should not be able to allow another Mastermind to take his place. A Prince for the Mastermind sounds fair.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion: Dayvig Mechanic for Unseen
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
This is why we wanted it to initially be a convert…

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion: Dayvig Mechanic for Unseen
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Hippolytus:

Giving it to Mastermind makes more sense balance wise actually. In the first 3 days mm will 100% kill the Prince if he outs which is good as prince shouldn’t be outing the early. After that mm probably wouldn’t though.

No. He would never use it. They would just wait until D4 and lynch the MM which is not an even trade.

Maybe Poacher? Poacher is super good too.

item.title: Suggestion: Dayvig Mechanic for Unseen
item.dc:creator: Yuzu
item.description:
I completely agree with this idea. However, i think this should be changed.

What would i change?

Add the dayvig killing ability for Assassin.
Imho, it should be a replacement for Distract. And maybe add the Distract for MM instead.
This would make that it’s always dangerous for Prince to out himself.

But honestly this ability should be also added for Cult. New Cult Killer class?

Read full topic
